column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses na Aaron dɛ
column4: "Israelmba no nkyer nsera wɔ nyimpa biara nankasa ne frankaa ho
column5: wɔ hɔn egyanom efi nsɛnkyerɛdze do: ehyiadzibuw no ne tsentsendo na wɔnkyer hɔn nsera no nhyia."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnkyer nsera wɔ boka afamu a odzi kɔ wipuei no nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Juda nseraban do frankaa ho no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse: na Amminadab ne babanyin Nason na ɔnyɛ Judamba no hɔn safohen panyin."
"Na no dɔm
column3: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnkyer nsera ntoa no do nye Isakar ebusuakuw. Zuar ne babanyin Netanel na ɔnyɛ Isakarmba no hɔn safohen panyin:"
"na no dɔm
column3: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no

column2: "Zebulun ebusuakuw ntoa do: na Helon ne babanyin Eliab na ɔnyɛ Zebulunmba no hɔn safohen panyin:"
"na no dɔm
column3: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no

column2: "Hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Juda nseraban do nyinara yɛ mpem ɔha eduowɔtwe esia na ahaanan
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse. Hɔn na wondzi kan ntu."

column2: "Pomu afamu na Reuben nseraban do frankaa ndzi dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse: na Sedeur ne babanyin Elizur na ɔnyɛ Reubenmba ɔsafohen panyin."
"Na no dɔm
column3: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no yɛ mpemeduanan esia na ahaenum."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔnkyer nsera ntoa no do nye Simeon ebusuakuw: na Zurisadai ne babanyin Selumiel na ɔnyɛ Simeonmba no hɔn safohen panyin:"
"na no dɔm a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no
"Gad ebusuakuw no ntoa hɔn do: na Reuel ne babanyin Eliasaf na ɔnyɛ Gadmba no hɔn safohen panyin:"
"na no dɔm a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no yɛ mpemeduanan enum na ahaesia eduonum."
"Hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Reuben nseraban do nyinara wɔyɛ mpem ɔha eduonum biako na ahaanan eduonum
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse. Na hɔn na wɔntɔ do ebien ntu."

column2: "Nkyii so ehyiadzibuw no
column3: nye Levifo nseraban no ntu ndzi nseraban nseraban no ne finimfin: dɛ mbrɛ wɔbɔ nseraban no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mfrankaa no tse."

column2: "Efraim ne nseraban do frankaa ndzi anee afamu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse: na Ammihud ne babanyin Elisama na ɔnyɛ Efraimmba no hɔn safohen panyin."
"Na no dɔm
column3: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no

column2: "Na Manaasɛ ebusuakuw ntoa no do: na Pedazur ne babanyin Gamaliel na ɔnyɛ Manaasɛmba no hɔn safohen panyin."
"Na no dɔm
column3: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no yɛ mpemeduasa ebien na ahaenu."

column2: "Benjamin ebusuakuw no
column3: Gideoni ne babanyin Abidan na ɔnyɛ hɔn safohen panyin:"

column2: "na no dɔm
column3: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no yɛ mpemeduasa enum na ahaanan."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Efraim nseraban do nyinara yɛ mpem ɔha nye awɔtwe na ɔha
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse. Na hɔn na wɔntɔ do ebiasa ntu."

column2: "Dan ne nseraban do frankaa ndzi kwaamu afamu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse: na Ammisaddai ne babanyin Ahiezer na ɔnyɛ Danmba no hɔn safohen panyin."
"Na no dɔm a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no yɛ mpemeduosia ebien na ahaesuon."
"Na hɔn a wɔnkyer nsera ntoa no do nye Aser ebusuakuw: na Okran ne babanyin Pagiel na ɔnyɛ Asermba no hɔn safohen panyin."
"No dɔm na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no
"Naftali ebusuakuw no
column3: Enan ne babanyin Ahira na ɔnyɛ Naftalimba no hɔn safohen panyin:"

column2: "na no dɔm a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no
"Hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Dan ne nseraban do nyinara yɛ mpem ɔha na eduonum esuon na ahaesia. Hɔn na wondzi ekyir ntu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mfrankaa no tse."
"Iyinom nye Israelmba mu hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee: hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ nseraban nseraban do dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tse nyinara yɛ mpemahaesia nye ebiasa na ahaenum eduonum."
"Levifo no dze
column3: wɔannkan hɔn ammfora Israelmba no; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no nyinara
column3: na wɔkyeer nsera dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mfrankaa no tse
column5: obiara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua na hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee."
